directives.name: MatButton
directives.selector:
button[mat-button], button[mat-raised-button], button[mat-icon-button],
             button[mat-fab], button[mat-mini-fab], button[mat-stroked-button],
             button[mat-flat-button]

directives.name: MatAnchor
directives.selector:
a[mat-button], a[mat-raised-button], a[mat-icon-button], a[mat-fab],
             a[mat-mini-fab], a[mat-stroked-button], a[mat-flat-button]

html.value:
<mat-form-field class="d-flex flex-column align-items-stretch">
  <mat-select aFocus [aFocusTrigger]="associationType" [(ngModel)]="model" [name]="name" [placeholder]="label" [multiple]="associationType.isMany" [required]="required" [disabled]="disabled" (ngModelChange)="onModelChange($event)" [attr.data-allors-id]="dataAllorsId" [attr.data-allors-roletype]="dataAllorsRoleType">
    <mat-option *ngIf="!required" [attr.data-allors-option-display]="'None'">None</mat-option>
    <mat-option *ngFor="let option of options" [value]="option" [attr.data-allors-option-display]="option[display]">
      {{option[display]}}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
</mat-form-field>
